feed.title: Voyager Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Voyager: 2.29.0
entry.content:
New Features

Temporarily unhide

You can now temporarily unhide posts by long pressing the hide posts button! The "slash eye" icon will change into an "eye" icon to indicate you are viewing everything. Tapping again will restore normal behavior.

Starter packs

This is part of my effort to improve the experience for new users. When you have no subscriptions and you enter your home feed, you will now see some information to get started, including access to starter packs to get you started. You can also access "starter packs" at any time from my communities page -> ellipse button in the header

✨ Changes

  • fix: larger touch target for video player buttons
  • PR: #1937
  • refactor: revert "fix: css specificity not working during minification (#1756)"
  • PR: #1938
  • fix: set user agent for lemmy requests on web build
  • PR: #1941
  • fix: supersub edge cases, link labels
  • PR: #1943
  • feat: starter packs
  • PR: #1939
  • feat: temporarily show hidden posts
  • PR: #1940
  • chore: upgrade dependencies
  • PR: #1944
  • fix: block markdown not parsed in post content preview
  • PR: #1945
  • refactor: lemmy v1 compat (apId, counts)
  • PR: #1847
  • fix: modlog mod instance on separate line
  • PR: #1946
  • fix: download imgur gifv crash
  • PR: #1948
  • fix: android theme inset lists and inputs style
  • PR: #1949
  • fix: misc android styling cleanup
  • PR: #1952
  • fix: gestures setting button missing detail icon on android
  • PR: #1954
  • fix: share voyager button on android
  • PR: #1953
  • fix: starter pack bg color, send button on android
  • PR: #1955

entry.title: New release for Voyager: 2.30.0
entry.content:
This release fixes a few bugs and regressions. There is one notable feature to user onboarding: the community list, when empty (user hasn't subscribed or favorited a community) will provide information to get started.

✨ Changes

  • fix: disable scroll restoration
  • PR: #1957
  • fix: announcement icon position with community at top setting
  • PR: #1958
  • feat: update tech and movies/tv starter packs
  • PR: #1960
  • feat: remove lemmy.one from signup list, community
  • PR: #1961
  • refactor: video portal node inline elements
  • PR: #1738
  • feat: empty community list onboarding
  • PR: #1963
  • fix: select text modal
  • PR: #1964
  • fix: crosspost dialog colors, colored theme backgrounds
  • PR: #1965

entry.title: New release for Voyager: 2.30.1
